mapper.select:
select count(*) from ding_dan dd left join ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt on dd.ddztId=ddzt.id left join che_liang cl on dd.cyclId=cl.id left join wu_zi_lei_xing wzlx on dd.wzlxId=wzlx.id left join wu_zi wz on dd.wzId=wz.id left join yun_shu_shang yss on dd.yssId=yss.id left join fa_huo_dan_wei fhdw on dd.fhdwId=fhdw.id left join shou_huo_dan_wei shdw on dd.shdwId=shdw.id left join si_ji sj on dd.cysjId=sj.id where 1=1
and dd.ddh like CONCAT('%',#{ddh},'%')
and dd.ddztId=#{ddztId}
and ddzt.mc=#{ddztMc}
and cl.cph like CONCAT('%',#{cph},'%')
and dd.jhysrq like CONCAT('%',#{jhysrq},'%')
and yss.mc like CONCAT('%',#{yssMc},'%')
and wz.mc like CONCAT('%',#{wzMc},'%')
and fhdw.mc like CONCAT('%',#{fhdwMc},'%')
and shdw.mc like CONCAT('%',#{shdwMc},'%')
and sj.xm like CONCAT('%',#{cysjXm},'%')
and sj.sfzh like CONCAT('%',#{cysjSfzh},'%')

select dd.*,ddzt.mc ddztMc,dfgbjl.dfgbmz,dfgbjl.dfgbpz,dfgbjl.dfgbjz,cl.cph cyclCph,wzlx.mc wzlxMc,wz.mc wzMc,yss.mc yssMc,fhdw.mc fhdwMc,shdw.mc shdwMc,sj.xm cysjXm from ding_dan dd left join ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt on dd.ddztId=ddzt.id left join dui_fang_guo_bang_ji_lu dfgbjl on dfgbjl.ddId=dd.id left join che_liang cl on dd.cyclId=cl.id left join wu_zi_lei_xing wzlx on dd.wzlxId=wzlx.id left join wu_zi wz on dd.wzId=wz.id left join yun_shu_shang yss on dd.yssId=yss.id left join fa_huo_dan_wei fhdw on dd.fhdwId=fhdw.id left join shou_huo_dan_wei shdw on dd.shdwId=shdw.id left join si_ji sj on dd.cysjId=sj.id where 1=1
and dd.ddh like CONCAT('%',#{ddh},'%')
and dd.ddztId=#{ddztId}
and ddzt.mc=#{ddztMc}
and cl.cph like CONCAT('%',#{cph},'%')
and dd.jhysrq like CONCAT('%',#{jhysrq},'%')
and yss.mc like CONCAT('%',#{yssMc},'%')
and wz.mc like CONCAT('%',#{wzMc},'%')
and fhdw.mc like CONCAT('%',#{fhdwMc},'%')
and shdw.mc like CONCAT('%',#{shdwMc},'%')
and sj.xm like CONCAT('%',#{cysjXm},'%')
and sj.sfzh like CONCAT('%',#{cysjSfzh},'%')
order by dd.bjsj desc limit #{rowNum},#{rows}
mapper.insert:
insert into ding_dan
ddh,
ddztId,
yjzt, ejzt,
lxlx,
yzxzl,
bs,
ks,
sjzl,
zlceb,
jhysrq,
bz,
ewm,
wzlxId,
wzId,
yssId,
fhdwId,
shdwId,
cyclId,
cysjId,
bjsj
values
#{ddh},
#{ddztId},
1, 1,
#{lxlx},
#{yzxzl},
#{bs},
#{ks},
#{sjzl},
#{zlceb},
#{jhysrq},
#{bz},
#{ewm},
#{wzlxId},
#{wzId},
#{yssId},
#{fhdwId},
#{shdwId},
#{cyclId},
#{cysjId},
now()
mapper.update:
update ding_dan set
ddh=#{ddh},
ddztId=#{ddztId},
yjzt=#{yjzt},
ejzt=#{ejzt},
sjsfzh=#{sjsfzh},
sjxm=#{sjxm},
cph=#{cph},
yjbfh=#{yjbfh},
ejbfh=#{ejbfh},
lxlx=#{lxlx},
yzxzl=#{yzxzl},
sjzl=#{sjzl},
zlceb=#{zlceb},
wzlxId=#{wzlxId},
wzId=#{wzId},
yssId=#{yssId},
fhdwId=#{fhdwId},
shdwId=#{shdwId},
bjsj=now()
where id=#{id}

update ding_dan set
ddh=#{ddh},
ddztId=#{xddztId},
yjzt=#{xyjzt},
ejzt=#{xejzt},
sjsfzh=#{sjsfzh},
sjxm=#{sjxm},
cph=#{cph},
lxlx=#{lxlx},
yzxzl=#{yzxzl},
sjzl=#{sjzl},
zlceb=#{zlceb},
wzlxId=#{wzlxId},
wzId=#{wzId},
yssId=#{yssId},
fhdwId=#{fhdwId},
shdwId=#{shdwId},
bjsj=now()
where ddztId=#{ddztId}
and yjbfh=#{yjbfh}
and ejbfh=#{ejbfh}
and yjzt=#{yjzt}
and ejzt=#{ejzt}
mapper.select: select * from ding_dan where ddztId=#{ddztId} and cph=#{cph}
select count(*) from ding_dan where ddh=#{ddh}
select count(*) from ding_dan dd,ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt where dd.ddztId=ddzt.id and dd.yjbfh=#{yjbfh} and dd.ejbfh=#{ejbfh} and ddzt.mc=#{ddztMc} and dd.yjzt=#{yjzt} and dd.ejzt=#{ejzt}
select * from ding_dan where id in (select rcjl.ddId from(select ddId from rglr_cph_ji_lu where cph=#{cph} order by lrsj desc LIMIT 0,1)as rcjl)
select id from ding_dan where ddh=#{ddh}
select count(*) from ding_dan where id=#{id} and cph=#{cph}
select substring(MAX(ddh),11,4) from ding_dan where ddh like CONCAT(#{ddhDate},'%')
